 2005-10222005-05-19,  RC,  ,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of National Revenue of ERNEST J. BRENNAN of Stratford, Prince Edward Island, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Anne Smith, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
